item.text: Thanks to Department H, we have the location of the factory that produces Apocalypse's army.
Yes, Infinites are clones, created from vats of genetic material and then enhanced with cybernetic implants.
Wow, and thousands of those get cranked out every day? It's no wonder Apocalypse had such an easy time attacking New York City and Genosha.
If we were to disable that factory, we'd strike a severe blow to Apocalypse. His unending supply of soldiers would dry up.
Department H told us the location - what do they want in return? Money? Information? Manpower? I know those boys and they don't work for free.
Da. It takes him a while to trust someone.
Go ahead and make your jokes, but I got plenty of reasons to suspect Department H. I can't tell you the number of times they've tried to force me back into their little family.
Department H did make a request of us.
I knew. I just knew it...
They asked if we would look for James MacDonald Hudson while we were at the factory. He was sent there a while ago to do reconnaissance and he hasn't been heard from since.
Then we better get there pronto and find out.
As you wish, Wolverine. Team, the best of luck to you at the Infinite factory.
